name: MATCHES_KB__Database_Alerts_High_Disk
description: Database disk usage on primary SQL server has exceeded 90% for the last 20 minutes. Multiple I/O wait alerts observed on the database volume.
summary: High disk usage on primary database server impacting performance.

name: NO_MATCH_IN_KB__Unknown_Service_Weird_Error
description: Service xyz-unknown is reporting intermittent foobar-1234 protocol violations with error code Z9. No prior tickets or runbooks are expected for this synthetic service.
summary: Critical unknown error from synthetic xyz-unknown service.
